lyrics.text:
Sīsū foaki mai
‘A e folofola;
Ko e tenga mo’oni,
Pea ta’engata.

Pea ‘e tupu ai,
‘A ho Kosipeli,
‘I he potu kotoa pē
‘O e fonua ni.

‘O mafola atu,
‘I he fu’u mālohi;
Ki māmani kotoa pē
‘I ho māfimafi.

‘O ne faka’auha,
‘A e ngāue kovi,
‘A e angahala, pea
Mo e ta’etui.

Ke fa’a ngāue ia,
‘I he loto tui,
Ke hoko ‘o tonuhia,
‘I ho angalelei.

Pea fakama’a
‘A e laumālie
Pea fonu, ‘i he ‘ofa
‘Oku mo’onia.

Ke mau fonu, ‘Eiki,
‘I ho’o mo’ui,
Pea mau ma’u, ‘i ‘olunga,
‘A e fu’u taloni.
